Config multile account - extra (contribute community)

by Necrobot2 Team — on Auth, Multi Account 23 Jan 2017

Easy instructions to set Necrobot to run multiple accounts one after each other

  1. In auth.json, set login credentials to your 1st account
  1. Near bottom of auth.json set your other accounts
  1. In config.json, tweak the Multi Bot settings as desired
Author

Necrobot2 Team
